  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10419</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Events of Holy Week - Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Eventos de la Semana Santa - Cuestionario</string>
            <string language="ga">Imeachtaí na Seachtaine Bheannaithe – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fälle der Osterwoche - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Événements de semaine sainte - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eventos da semana holy - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eventi della settimana santa - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεγονότα της ιερής εβδομάδας - διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will get a bigger perspective on what happened during Holy Week.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes conseguirán una mayor perspectiva sobre lo que ocurrió durante la Semana Santa.</string>
            <string language="ga">Gheobhaidh daltaí léargas níos fearr ar na rudai a tharla le linn na Seachtaine Bheannaithe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erhalten eine grössere Perspektive
auf, was während der Osterwoche geschah.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants obtiendront une plus grande 
perspective sur ce qui s'est produit pendant la semaine sainte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes começarão um perspective mais 
grande em o que aconteceu durante a semana holy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi otterranno una prospettiva più grande
su che cosa è accaduto durante la settimana santa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα πάρουν μια μεγαλύτερη προοπτική σε 
αυτό που συνέβη κατά τη διάρκεια της ιερής εβδομάδας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
